course_description: This course provides an overview of individual psychotherapeutic treatment across the lifespan using a neuroscientifically-informed relationship based framework for practice. Emphasis is on the development of therapeutic engagement, and reflective practice for brief, supportive nurse-led therapy.
prerequisites: NRSG 771D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
